channel.title: Comments on: Marijuana could be good for your brain
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description:
OK, so you smoke pot. I realy don't understand you people who support this shit which clearly increase the violence and crime in our society. Don't you read papers? These days young kids smoke marijuana, bit up their teachers in school and then hallucinate seeing monkies walking down the streets.
Also I heard that it is kind of pass?© in Tel Aviv, so realy you don't need to brag about it all the time. Innocent and na?‾ve kids who log into your blog by mistake, might persume that this shit has good side effects.
item.content:encoded:
OK, so you smoke pot. I realy don’t understand you people who support this shit which clearly increase the violence and crime in our society. Don’t you read papers? These days young kids smoke marijuana, bit up their teachers in school and then hallucinate seeing monkies walking down the streets.

Also I heard that it is kind of pass?© in Tel Aviv, so realy you don’t need to brag about it all the time. Innocent and na?‾ve kids who log into your blog by mistake, might persume that this shit has good side effects.
